sentences: Mayu Maeshima (前島 麻由, Maeshima Mayu, born April 14, 1993) is a Japanese singer from Tokyo who is affiliated with Newcome.
Beginning her music activities as an independent musician, she was the lead vocalist of the music unit MYTH & ROID from 2015 to 2017.
After leaving MYTH & ROID, she resumed activities as a solo artist, making her major debut in 2019.
Maeshima's music activities began as a member of the band Ms. Velonica, which was active from 2012 until 2013.
In 2015, she became a member of the music unit MYTH & ROID, serving as its lead vocalist until November 2017.
In 2019, she released the digital single "YELLOW" under Warner Music Japan.

Her second single "ANSWER" was released on May 26, 2021;  the title song is used as the opening theme to the anime series  Full Dive: This Ultimate Next-Gen Full Dive RPG Is Even Shittier than Real Life!.
